convertToTree() - Method in class dag.DirectedGraph
Converts this DAG into a tree by successively removing incoming edges from nodes with more than one incoming edge using the method described in the thesis (Sect.
convertToTree() - Method in class dag.Vertex
Removes all but one incoming edge from this vertex to ensure that the corresponding AMR graph is a tree as soon as this method has been applied to all vertices.
